alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 30 at 2:30PM CST until January 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor flooding of agricultural and forested areas near the bayou will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 18.2 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 11.0 Fri 1 pm CST 16.4 17.6 14.1 &&
